channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon may up its investment in Anthropic — on one condition

item.title: Crypto CEO kidnapped in Toronto, released after paying $1M ransom
item.description: The CEO of Canadian cryptocurrency firm WonderFi was kidnapped and held for ransom on Wednesday, according to CBC. Dean Skurka was reportedly shoved i...

item.title: eBay Coupon Code: $5 Off Select Orders in November 2024
item.description: Get $5 off when you spend $200+ on select products, and enjoy other great deals at eBay this November.

item.title: Block scales back TIDAL investment and shutters TBD in favor of Bitcoin mining

item.title: Top Canon Promo Codes and Coupons for November 2024
item.description: Save up to $5,000 on refurbished cameras, $300 off lenses, and more with today’s discount codes.

item.title: Yelp just spent $80M on a site for car repair estimates

item.title: Design Within Reach Promo Code: 15% Off | November 2024
item.description: Save an extra 15% at checkout with Design Within Reach discount code, plus up to 60% off furniture.

item.title: The Best Early Black Friday Deals on Outdoor Gear
item.description: Why wait? Our favorite tents, sleeping bags, backpacks, and other outdoor gear are on sale now.

item.title: AI-powered parenting is here and a16z is ready to back it

item.title: Starship’s Next Launch Could Be Just Two Weeks Away
item.description: The SpaceX rocket will launch during the late afternoon so its descent into the Indian Ocean is visible.
